text: I'm on VH1 now, will be working on ITV's This Morning again from September.
author: Lisa Snowdon

text: I m up at 5 in the morning and in bed by 10 in the evening.
author: DeForest Kelley

text: I loved it, but social reality impeded. Now I wander in here at 9 in the morning or so, and come back for a while in the afternoon. I am a very lenient boss.
author: Donald E. Westlake

text: I start work at 5 in the morning and I have a wicked insomnia problem.
author: Don Winslow

text: You know, I mean this sincerely, you know, I'm so grateful that I get to get up in the morning and do this, you know, and write books.
author: Don Winslow
